name: CreateEventProperty
description:
Create a new property for an existing event definition.

Use this tool to add a new property to an existing event in Hubspot, enhancing the event's data structure.

parameters.name: custom_event_internal_name
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event for which the property is being created.

value_schema.description: The internal name of the custom event.

parameters.name: event_property_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the new event property's details, such as name, type, label, description, and options if applicable.

name.description: Internal property name, which must be used when referencing the property from the API

options.description: A list of available options for the property if it is an enumeration. NOTE: This field is only applicable for enumerated properties.

description.description: A description of the property that will be shown as help text in HubSpot.

label.description: Human readable label for the property. Used in HubSpot UI

type.description: The data type of the property. Can be one of the following: [string, number, enumeration, datetime]

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Hubspot Events API

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The internal name of the custom event.

value_schema.description: The internal name of the custom event.

name.description: Internal property name, which must be used when referencing the property from the API

options.description: A list of available options for the property if it is an enumeration. NOTE: This field is only applicable for enumerated properties.

description.description: A description of the property that will be shown as help text in HubSpot.

label.description: Human readable label for the property. Used in HubSpot UI

type.description: The data type of the property. Can be one of the following: [string, number, enumeration, datetime]

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
